sections.description: GalleryPlus for Headway is a great block for displaying your galleries of photos. And whatâ€™s more, it is four blocks in one! With GalleryPlus you get an Accordion gallery block, a Carousel gallery block, a Slider gallery block, and a Thumbgrid gallery block.
sections.changelog:
1.5.7 : 15-Jun-2012

  • UPDATED: Pizazz libs with BackupBuddy 3 compatibility fix

1.5.6 : 14-Jun-2012

  • CHANGED: Support links to Headway forums

1.5.5 : 13-Jun-2012

  • CHANGED: Removed version check
  • CHANGED: Updated HW updater function
  • CHANGED: Renamed file and folder
  • FIXED: jQueryUI tabs conflict (Affected by JigoShop and others)

1.5.4

  • CHANGED: Headway auto updater routine

1.5.3

  • FIXED: Order showing as numeric in ThumbGrid settings
  • FIXED: Padding between thumbs not working
  • ADDED: Code for Headway marketplace compatibility

1.5.2

  • FIXED: Lightbox background opacity not working
  • FIXED: The opacity of text background properly this time!

1.5.1

  • FIXED: Missing text background options for slider galleries

1.5.0

  • ADDED: WP Auto update
